mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.course_id AS "courseId", a.name AS "name", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO unit( id, course_id, name, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{courseId}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE unit SET course_id = #{courseId}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
